fields.description: true if the service principal account is enabled; otherwise, false.
fields.name: AccountEnabled

fields.description: The globally unique identifier for the associated application (its appId property), if any.
fields.name: AppId

fields.description: The display name for the service principal.
fields.name: DisplayName

fields.description: Represents the risk history of Microsoft Entra service principals.
fields.name: History

fields.description: Indicates whether Microsoft Entra ID Protection is currently processing the service principal's risky state.
fields.name: IsProcessing

fields.description: Details of the detected risk. Note: Details for this property are only available for Workload Identities Premium customers. Events in tenants without this license will be returned hidden. The possible values are: none, hidden,  unknownFutureValue, adminConfirmedServicePrincipalCompromised, adminDismissedAllRiskForServicePrincipal. Note that you must use the Prefer: include-unknown-enum-members request header to get the following value(s) in this evolvable enum: adminConfirmedServicePrincipalCompromised , adminDismissedAllRiskForServicePrincipal.
fields.name: RiskDetail

fields.description: The date and time that the risk state was last updated. The DateTimeOffset type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2021 is 2021-01-01T00:00:00Z. Supports $filter (eq).
fields.name: RiskLastUpdatedDateTime

fields.description: Level of the detected risky workload identity. The possible values are: low, medium, high, hidden, none, unknownFutureValue. Supports $filter (eq).
fields.name: RiskLevel

fields.description: State of the service principal's risk. The possible values are: none, confirmedSafe, remediated, dismissed, atRisk, confirmedCompromised, unknownFutureValue.
fields.name: RiskState

fields.description: Identifies whether the service principal represents an Application, a ManagedIdentity, or a legacy application (socialIdp). This is set by Microsoft Entra ID internally and is inherited from servicePrincipal.
fields.name: ServicePrincipalType
